title: Is the Bear Market Over?
description:
The S&P 500 is up 10% from its low point – a top market strategist shares why it could be a mirage. Plus, recession-proof investing tips from a seasoned fund manager.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
